name: Runeblade (itch)
description:
Runeblade is an ARPG Rogue-like being developed as a Capstone project by a small group for the New England Institute of Technology Game Design Bachelor's program.

We're currently looking for feedback on the current iteration of our game and appreciate any comments or critiques that you may have.  We appreciate everyone that tests our game and fills out our playtest survey located below.

Playtest Survey: https://goo.gl/forms/ydNT31QFrragfRqo2
